details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 4.1 Compatible - 4.1.2 Contrast (Minimum) - Name, Role, Value - Table elements
details.description: The structure type and attributes of table elements shall be semantically appropriate.

rule.description: The structure type and attributes of table elements shall be semantically appropriate.
rule.test: ((((correctType == 'TD' || correctType == 'TR' || correctType == 'TH') && correctSemanticScore > 0.8) == false) || isTableChild) && (((correctType == 'TD' || correctType == 'TR' || correctType == 'TH') && correctSemanticScore > 0.8) || (isTableElem == false))
